description: 6.4 km hike within the Witchcraft Lake and Mt Benson area. Elevation 250m to 390m with an ascent of 218m and decent of 206m.
directions: Heading north on Jinglepot Road turn left onto Kirkpatrick Road. Drive 1.7 km and turn right onto Benson View Road. Follow road to park entrance and start of trail head
title: Witchcraft Lake and area
